name: Trash Tuesday
description:
You are Papo, a world-famous and extremely popular Youtube Content Creator. But you have a problem, and this is your colleague and rival Sterzik. He is trying to steal your recording day and destroy your new format. You cannot accept this and you have to try to stop him from getting your recording day. However, he does not give up and you have to fight him over several waves, and in the end a special guest will arrive... So grab your e-scooter and join Papo on his adventure. 

This game was created within a small challenge in only two days. If you want new updates with new creative content, follow us on Instagram under @cursed.dog
